TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpGetClientProtocol extends System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpSimpleClientProtocol

summary.span: The base class for XML Web service client proxies that use the HTTP-GET protocol.

span.span: The base class for XML Web service client proxies that use the HTTP-GET protocol.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 XML Web 服务客户端使用 HTTP GET 协议时，参数编码到 URL 中和在纯 XML 中返回的响应。When an XML Web service client uses the HTTP-GET protocol, parameters are encoded within the URL and the response is returned in plain XML. 如果要生成的 XML Web 服务客户端，然后使用 ASP.NET，间接派生的代理类，或直接从需要为你想要调用 XML Web 服务创建。If you are building an XML Web service client using ASP.NET, then a proxy class deriving indirectly or directly from needs to be created for the XML Web service you want to call. 当 XML Web 服务客户端调用 XML Web 服务使用 HTTP 时，派生代理类从，它又派生。When the XML Web service client calls the XML Web service using HTTP, derive the proxy class from , which in turn derives from . 并派生自，为调用 XML Web 服务方法分别使用 HTTP-GET 和 HTTP-POST 协议提供支持。 and derive from , providing the support for calling an XML Web service method using the HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST protocols respectively. 调用 XML Web 服务使用 SOAP 的客户端应派生自。Clients calling an XML Web service using SOAP should derive from . 生成代理类的详细信息，请参阅[创建 XML Web 服务代理](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/d2s8y7bs(v=vs.100))。For details on building a proxy class, see [Creating an XML Web Service Proxy](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/d2s8y7bs(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例是 wsdl.exe 为生成的代理类`Math`下面的 XML Web 服务。The following example is a proxy class generated by Wsdl.exe for the `Math` XML Web service below. 代理类派生自，又派生自抽象类。The proxy class derives from , which derives from the abstract class. [!code-cpp[Classic HttpGetClientProtocol Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpGetClientProtocol Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic HttpGetClientProtocol Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpGetClientProtocol Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpGetClientProtocol Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpGetClientProtocol Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下面的示例是`Math`XML Web 服务，从其创建更高版本的代理类。The following example is the `Math` XML Web service, from which the above proxy class was created. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HttpGetClientProtocol Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpGetClientProtocol Example/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HttpGetClientProtocol Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpGetClientProtocol Example/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]

param.span: The to use when creating the .

summary.span: Creates a instance for the specified URI.

span.span: Creates a instance for the specified URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法重写的基础版本来指定使用 HTTP GET 使对 XML Web 服务的 HTTP 请求。This method overrides the base version of to specify that the HTTP request to the XML Web service is made using HTTP-GET. 通过重写此方法，可以对进行其他自定义对象，然后才能进行 XML Web 服务请求。By overriding this method, additional customizations can be made to the object before the XML Web service request is made. 例如无法将自定义标头添加到请求。For example you could add a custom header to the request.

exception.span: The parameter is null or has a length of zero.

span.span: The parameter is null or has a length of zero.
